sentence.Network_en: This can lead to bodily weakness and muscle wastage.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样可能会导致身体虚弱和肌肉萎缩。

sentence.Network_en: They were both found guilty of causing grievous bodily harm.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们两人都被判造成他人严重人身伤害的罪名成立。

sentence.Network_en: There's more to eating than just bodily needs.
sentence.Network_cn: 饮食不仅仅是出于身体的需要。

entry.def: Your bodily needs and functions are the needs and functions of your body.

example.tran: 对人体自然生理功能的描述

example.ex: There's more to eating than just bodily needs.
example.tran: 饮食不仅仅是出于身体的需要。

entry.def: You use bodily to indicate that an action involves the whole of someone's body.

example.ex: I was hurled bodily to the deck.
example.tran: 我整个人都被摔到了甲板上。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or belonging to the body;
2. affecting or characteristic of the body as opposed to the mind or spirit;
3. having or relating to a physical material body;

auth_sentence.content: This is our father Francisco, Among us bodily.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is our father Francisco, Among us bodily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is our father Francisco, Among us bodily.

auth_sentence.content: He started to get out...threatening bodily harm.
auth_sentence.res_content: He started to get out...threatening bodily harm.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He started to get out...threatening bodily harm.

auth_sentence.content: HIV requires intimate contact and the transfer of bodily fluids.
auth_sentence.res_content: HIV requires intimate contact and the transfer of bodily fluids.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: HIV requires intimate contact and the transfer of bodily fluids.

sentences.en: Some drugs can cause the inhibition of normal bodily activity.
sentences.cn: 某些药物能抑制正常的身体功能。

sentences.en: Fortunately, his head injuries left his bodily functions unimpaired.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是他的头伤没有影响到身体机能。

sentences.en: Qingdao is a resort efficacious for a variety of bodily ills.
sentences.cn: 青岛是一个对各种身体疾病都有疗效的疗养胜地。

sentences.en: You can contract Aids if your bodily fluids come into contact with the bodily fluids of someone else who is infected with HIV.
sentences.cn: 如果你的体液与染有HIV者的体液接触,你就会染上艾滋病。

sentences.en: He likes to be sure of his bodily comforts.

means.word_mean: 整体地,全部地；成为一体地

sentences.en: The audience rose bodily to cheer the hero.
sentences.cn: 听众全体起立向那位英雄欢呼致意。

sentences.en: Parts of your article have been lifted bodily from a well-known magazine.
sentences.cn: 你的文章中有几部分是从一本有名的杂志中整个抄袭来的。

means.word_mean: 亲身地;以肉体形式,活生生地

sentences.en: The man we thought dead walked bodily into the room.
sentences.cn: 我们以为死了的那个人活生生地走进了房间。
